title: Clear day in the city, slow-speed driving with 7 braking events.
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a foggy city street with tall buildings and a palm tree on the sidewalk.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.5 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The blue car is driving slowly on a foggy city street with tall buildings and a palm tree on the sidewalk. There are several other cars on the road, including a white car and a black car. The road is wet and there is a traffic light on the corner. The weather is clear and the sky is blue.
reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly because of the foggy conditions and the presence of other vehicles on the road. The 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window suggest that the driver is being extra careful and braking early to avoid any potential accidents.
